title: Novartis ' spending on research and development by segment 2017 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Companys on X-axis for 3 groups 2017, 2018, and 2019. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Expenditure in billion USD.
Out of all 3 groups, 2019 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD in Company Innovative Medicines and 2019 had the lowest Expenditure in billion USD in Company Alcon.
Among all the Companys, 2017 had the highest Expenditure in billion USD in Company Innovative Medicines and lowest Expenditure in billion USD in Company Alcon.
Company Innovative Medicines and Alcon had the biggest gap of 704.0 between the highest and lowest Expenditure in billion USD found for 2017.
